    @pytest.mark.run(order=1)

    def test_get_tag(self, case_data):

        print(">>>>>:请求body")

        print(">>>>>: 响应数据")
        print(res.json())
        allure.attach(res.text, "响应结果", allure.attachment_type.JSON)
